IDE_accessible_MHK module¶

Main of the application wich contains the classes to init the app

Classes:

Thread which execute command when he’s created

FirmwareManager()

Class which contains parameters to use esptool

MainWindow of the app which will contains all the children classes and

Class with useful methods to manage Connection related with the frame

Minimal class to launch the app

Functions:

InitShortcuts(frame)

Initiate shortcuts of the Application with wx.Accelerator Table

create_panels(frame)

Inits the differents regions(TreeView, Notebook, Shell) in the frame

init_toolbar(frame)

Inits an instance of the customized ToolBar class and places it on the frame

init_top_menu(frame)

Inits an instance of customized TopMenu class and places it on the frame

my_speak(frame, txt)

Speak the texte given in params by creating a thread dedicated

read_cmd(frame, data)

Get the return of the cmd sent to the MicroPython card

serial_read_data(frame, data)

Handle input from the serial port.

OnDownFocus(evt)¶

Allow to navigate in the differents region of the Frame after an event

Parameters

evt (wx.Event https://wxpython.org/Phoenix/docs/html/wx.Event.html) – Event binded to trigger the function

OnKey(evt)¶

Key event handler. If the key is in the ASCII range, write it to the serial port. Newline handling is also done here.

OnStatus(evt)¶

Set the Focus on the Status Bar

Parameters

evt (wx.Event https://wxpython.org/Phoenix/docs/html/wx.Event.html) – Event binded to trigger the function

command back

right_click_shortcut(evt)¶

Link right click evt with a shortcut

start_thread_serial()¶

Start the receiver thread

stop_thread_serial()¶

Stop the receiver thread, wait until it’s finished.

thread_listen_port()¶

Thread that handles the incoming traffic. Does the basic input transformation (newlines) and call an serial_read_data

OnInit()¶

Special constructor (do not modify) which affect the Mainwindow to the App

Returns

a boolean to stop or continue the

Return type

Bool –if False exit or error –if True the app works
